elements.title: Jupiter Power
elements.description: Jupiter’s fleet of assets in operation or construction includes the largest energy storage fleet in Texas and one of the largest development pipelines in the US. Has been acquired from EnCap by Blackrock in [Nov 2022](https://www.energy-storage.news/blackrock-buys-us-battery-storage-developer-jupiter-power/)

elements.title: Abundance
elements.description: UK based Abundance helps impact investors put their money to work to fund the infrastructure we need to tackle the climate emergency and create a fairer, greener future for us all.

elements.title: Greencoat Capital
elements.description: Greencoat Capital LLP is a specialist manager dedicated to the renewable energy infrastructure sector. It has offices in London and Dublin and approximately £7 billion under management.

elements.title: Bluefield partners llp
elements.description: Bluefield Partners LLP is a London based investment specialist focused on renewable energy, with a focus on solar PV assets.

elements.title: Triodos Investment Management - Energy Transition Europe
elements.description: Directly investing in small to medium-sized clean energy projects throughout Europe. In [Feb 2022](https://www.current-news.co.uk/news/gridbeyond-targets-battery-storage-pipeline-thanks-to-financing-from-triodos-energy-transition-europe-fund) invested 10M for behind the meter battery storage with [GridBeyond](https://gridbeyond.com/gridbeyond-and-triodos-energy-transition-europe-fund-agree-partnership-to-provide-e10million-of-funding-to-install-behind-the-meter-battery-storage/)

elements.title: M & G
elements.description: An international savings and investment business who set specific and ambitious targets in two sustainability priority areas: climate change and diversity and inclusion

elements.title: Climate Bonds Initiative
elements.description: Climate Bonds Initiative is an international organisation working solely to mobilise the largest capital market of all, the $100 trillion bond market, for climate change solutions

elements.title: Clim8 invest
elements.description: Our platform provides a simple way to invest into a targeted portfolio of publicly listed companies that are already making an impact in tackling climate change.

elements.title: Quinbrook
elements.description: Quinbrook was established in July 2015 by David Scaysbrook and Rory Quinlan who have invested in renewables for over two decades and in power infrastructure

elements.title: Nanuk
elements.description: Nanuk Asset Management was established in 2009 to develop world-leading expertise in the investment opportunities and risks associated with environmental sustainability and resource use efficiency.

elements.title: Asper
elements.description: Asper is an independent investment manager focused on building sustainable real assets

elements.title: Nuveen
elements.description: Nuveen invest in the growth of businesses, real estate, farmland, forests and infrastructure

elements.title: Glennmont
elements.description: Glennmont Partners is one of Europe’s largest fund managers focusing exclusively on investment in clean energy infrastructure. In 2021, Glennmont was acquired by Nuveen, the investment management arm of TIAA.

elements.title: SDCL
elements.description: SDCL is a specialist investment and advisory firm established in 2007, with a proven track record of financing and developing clean energy, energy efficiency and decentralised energy infrastructure projects in the UK, Continental Europe, North America and Asia.

elements.title: Gresham house
elements.description: Gresham House is a specialist alternative asset manager, listed on the London Stock Exchange’s Alternative Investment Market (AIM)

elements.title: Goclimateneutral
elements.description: Goclimateneutral invests in carbon negative projects by taking recurring payments from donors. Also has a [business footprint calculator](https://www.goclimateneutral.org/business/climate_reports/new)

elements.title: Abundance Investment
elements.description: Abundance Investment creating ways for everyone to invest in green and social infrastructure

elements.title: Switchr
elements.description: Switchr business model is to buy and optimize solar-plants with strict investment criteria where they see the greatest potential for increased performance.

elements.title: Trine
elements.description: Trine , Sweden based, makes it easy for people to invest in solar energy in growing markets. Their mission is to give people a triple return on investment

elements.title: Project Wren
elements.description: Project Wren [backed by YCombinator](https://techcrunch.com/2019/07/07/y-combinator-backed-project-wren-is-aiming-to-make-carbon-offsets-more-consumer-friendly/), app to fund carbon negative projects, also has a carbon emission calculator

elements.title: Connecticut green bank
elements.description: Also worth searching for green banks, like Connecticut green bank

elements.title: Crowdcube
elements.description: Major crowdfunding platform Crowdcube and [Startengine](https://www.startengine.com/) have dedicated sections

elements.title: Energy4impact
elements.description: Energy4impact access to energy in Africa

elements.title: Citizenergy.eu
elements.description: Citizenergy.eu born out of the motivation to promote the decentralised and democratic financing of a better energy future by supporting sustainable energy crowdfunding platforms and energy cooperatives.

elements.title: Triodos Bank Crowdfunding
elements.description: Triodos opportunities to invest in organisations committed to delivering positive change.

elements.title: Fundeen
elements.description: Fundeen is a FinTech platform that allows citizens of Spain to invest in environmentally sustainable projects and receive benefits from their investments.
